snippet: San Francisco linebacker Aldon Smith was arrested at Los Angeles International Airport after the authorities said he became belligerent during a security screening and threatened that he had a bomb.
abstract: San Francisco 49ers linebacker Aldon Smith is arrested at Los Angeles International Airport after authorities said he became belligerent during a security screening and threatened that he had a bomb; he is now involved in three pending criminal cases.
lead_paragraph: San Francisco linebacker Aldon Smith was arrested at Los Angeles International Airport after the authorities said he became belligerent during a security screening and threatened that he had a bomb.
